name: Space Survival (itch) (Korhan)
description:
My game "Space Survival" for the Untitled Game Jam #38.

Save the Universe and kill the Purgatory Boss.

Shoot as fast as you can and be the hero!

______________________________________________________________

Everything was made by myself from the Art to the Music.

I made this project in 4 Days.

Have fun!

Greets Korhan
